name: com.i5.virtualagents
description: A Unity package for creating virtual agents

author.name:
Advanced Community Information Systems
Informatik 5, RWTH Aachen University

samples.description: Example scene which shows how walking tasks can be issued to the agent. The agent walks along a path defined by a series of waypoints.
Example scene which shows how agents can wait in an idle position.

Two example scenes which demonstrates the scheduling of independent tasks on multiple body parts in parallel. One of them shows tasks that do not depend on another and in the second scene tasks wait for the completion of other tasks.
